comments.body:
Since the license file is manually packaged, I submitted a PR upstream to hopefully deal with this in future releases: https://github.com/fabiocaccamo/django-maintenance-mode/pull/69

Could you please put a comment above `license_file: LICENSE.txt` that reads:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/fabiocaccamo/django-maintenance-mode/pull/69
license_file: LICENSE.txt
...
```

This will be a visual reminder to check if the license file is in the source distribution in future releases when the feedstock gets updated.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@  license: MIT
  # License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/fabiocaccamo/django-maintenance-mode/pull/69
  license_file: LICENSE.txt

extra:
